name: The All-New Misadventures of Dangerous Dave: Episode 1 - Dave's Risky Rescue
name_original: The All-New Misadventures of Dangerous Dave: Episode 1 - Dave's Risky Rescue
description:
The All-New Misadventures of Dangerous Dave: Episode 1 - Dave's Risky Rescue is an action, arcade and platformer game developed by Gamer's Edge. It was originally released in 1993. It was published by Softdisk Publishing. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play The All-New Misadventures of Dangerous Dave: Episode 1 - Dave's Risky Rescue on PC.
It was produced by Greg Malone, John Romero and Tom Hall. It was directed by John Romero and Tom Hall.
